metadata.title: CVE-2017-6596 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: partclone.chkimg in partclone 0.2.89 is prone to a heap-based bufferoverflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the partcloneimage header. An attacker may be able to launch a 'Denial of Serviceattack' in the context of the user running the affected application.

criterions.comment: partclone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
